let's try this wording as a *real* compromise, even though the sources actually support "Best known"

you seem to have mis-read [[WP:V]] - please review
A priori, it is not clear Hamas is also best known for this in Iran, Syria etc. A reliable source for this statement must show how they arrived at this conclusion (e.g. via a poll)
Newspapers are reliable sources for general knowledge. This is not discussing obstruse genetic issues (for example)
You can't reason like this. A statement like this needs to be backed up by a serious study. Newpapers report on facts, they are not reliable sources for scientific facts unless they cite a study.
remove POV - reliable sources say it, none dispute it, and inserted POV not required
Roll back some major POV spin. Please try talk page before adding such a major change of tone.
